037package org.jfree.chart.entity;
038
039import java.awt.Shape;
040import org.jfree.chart.internal.Args;
041import org.jfree.chart.plot.flow.FlowPlot;
042import org.jfree.data.flow.NodeKey;
043
044/**
045 * A chart entity representing a node in a {@link FlowPlot}.
046 * 
047 * @since 1.5.3
048 */
049public class NodeEntity extends ChartEntity {
050
051    private NodeKey key;
052    
053    /**
054     * Creates a new instance.
055     * 
056     * @param key  the node key ({@code null} not permitted).
057     * @param area  the outline of the entity ({@code null} not permitted).
058     * @param toolTipText  the tool tip text.
059     */
060    public NodeEntity(NodeKey key, Shape area, String toolTipText) {
061        super(area, toolTipText);
062        Args.nullNotPermitted(key, "key");
063        this.key = key;
064    }
065    
066    /**
067     * Creates a new instance.
068     * 
069     * @param area  the outline of the entity ({@code null} not permitted).
070     * @param toolTipText  the tool tip text.
071     * @param urlText  the URL text.
072     */
073    public NodeEntity(Shape area, String toolTipText, String urlText) {
074        super(area, toolTipText, urlText);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Returns the node key.
079     * 
080     * @return The node key (never {@code null}). 
081     */
082    public NodeKey getKey() {
083        return this.key;
084    }
085    
086    /**
087     * Returns a string representation of this instance, primarily for 
088     * debugging purposes.
089     * 
090     * @return A string. 
091     */
092    @Override
093    public String toString() {
094        return "[NodeEntity: " + this.key + "]";
095    }
096
097}
